comment:
@Deborah96057656 @JWSpry @NSIDC_ArcticIce Yeah. But this whole discussion becomes completely ridiculous when we ask: The whole earth? Soil? Oceans? Atmosphere? In what depht, in what height?
Oh, mankind. Stop handling this huge, completely sun dependent planet as if it is one of your silly tiny apps.
